subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Same stupid nasty negative BS!
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
----------MB_8CCD5ED33D446BC_C40_150FB_webmail-m039.sysops.aol.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"

 Well, for what it's worth, sure seems "real" to me. sf

 



-----Original=
 Message-----
From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
To: EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wed, Jun 9, 2010 3:52 am
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC]=
 Re: Same stupid nasty negative BS!

          =C2=A0                      =
            
=C2=A0It's probably not kosher to post this, but I find this h=
ighly insulting to all of us. As usual, igonore all facts and all other met=
hods, such as EVPmaker, which forms all the voices inside=C2=A0the computer=
. Ignore all phone EVP messages, ignore all voices heard with no electronic=
 aids. Ignore messages received via turned off TV and printers--and on and =
on, yet they know all about EVP..Ignore the fact that probably thousands us=
e boxes successfully.
  =C2=A0
 "We have conducted a few listening studies =
of reported radio-sweep EVP and the results have not been good. We have als=
o worked with a variety of such devices. Based on what we know about trans-=
etheric influences, how EVP and visual forms of ITC are formed and what we =
know about mediumship, it is difficult to fit radio-sweep into any establis=
hed hypothesis. Without solid research supporting it as producing EVP, it i=
s impossible for us to recommend it or support its use. If there were doubl=
e-blind studies conducted by experienced researchers that shows it does pro=
duce phenomena, we would gladly promote it as an alternative technique.
 =
=C2=A0
We are pretty sure that, in transform EVP (ordinary recorder), the v=
oice is formed in the electronics by transforming available audio-frequency=
 noise in an active part of the electronics such as a transistor junction. =
We think the process is amplification of a weak telekinetic signal via stoc=
hastic resonance and we have found that the optimum audio-frequency signal =
for this is a chaotic one rich in voice-frequencies with many transient per=
turbation. That is our working hypothesis. "
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0I can't say wh=
o this is from, cuz almost certain I'd get sued. There's no double blind te=
sting their BS either. Clueless!!
 =C2=A0
 =C2=A0F-S


 On Wed, Jun 9, 2010=
 at 1:24 AM, paracomm <xxxsinxxxsinxxx@...> wrote:
  =C2=A0    =
 When people start calling themselves experts at something that is not or m=
ay never be fully understood the crap gets deep. I love these so called exp=
erts that tell us that we can only make contact using their exact methods a=
nd we need to refrain from any other way of doing research because in their=
 eyes were just spinning our wheels. So we can't get communication from mod=
ified radios and were all just hearing what we want I guess. I have heard i=
t all,,"I wrote a book and im an expert" or "believe me that wont work, I k=
now cause im physic"=E2=80=A6.in one ear and out the other. Everyone is an =
expert these days and most of what they say is BS. If I start hearing someo=
ne or something talking through my dogs butt guess what im recording it.
 
=
Sounds like these so called experts are just trying to deter and silence an=
ything they dont agree with by doing there Scientific tests. If it works it=
 works and if it didnt work what the hell are we all still doing here.  


=
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> =
wrote:
>

  
 > Got letter(e-mail) from a world renowned EVP authorit=
y( name withheld cuz I
> know the threats that would come), explaining h=
ow they tested the boxes and
> found nothing to it, y'all just silly uni=
nformed masses that don't know any
 > better and they'll tell us all wha=
t's ok to hear and believe in! Thousands
> of box users and experiencers=
 are either lying or insane!
> 
> Pseudo scientific BS! Their testing=
 reveals exactly what they expectt, that
 > is the nature of the paranor=
mal. Getting the results they wanted, they puff
> out their chests and p=
roclaim yet another victory for science! Science has
> a habit of supply=
ing exactly the results wanted by whoever is paying for the
 > tests..
&=
gt; 
> First, where do they find people that are somehow qualified liste=
ners!? WTF
> is that S---!? It's BS, and they know it. Same old skeptic/=
science crap,
> except from a group that wants to be the worlds onlyest =
EVP authority.
 > 
> I'm sure there will be articles in major paranor=
mal mags proclaiming how
> the experts thoroughly debunked the boxes.
&g=
t; 
> They keep testing and getting nothing, and the rest of us keep rec=
ording
 > and have no shortage of voices that others can hear, can be va=
lidated, and
> gives infromation that's unknow to the listener. I just p=
osted a video where
> a voice says "I said fuck" just to show it's not b=
roadcast frags. This stuff
 > conveniently ignored. I've been kicked off=
 groups for getting voices thast
> somehow were judged not ghostly enoug=
h, cuz all the experts know ghosts
> can't cuss, they can barely even ta=
lk and communcate!
 > 
> They send me their stupid results thinking I=
'm the one out there pushing
> boxes. Ignorant dorks, it's the results p=
ushing boxes!
> 
> Frank-S
>

iv></div>

<div> It's probably not kosher to post this, but I find thi=
s highly insulting to all of us. As usual, igonore all facts and all other =
methods, such as EVPmaker, which forms all the voices inside the compu=
ter. Ignore all phone EVP messages, ignore all voices heard with no electro=
nic aids. Ignore messages received via turned off TV and printers--and on a=
nd on, yet they know all about EVP..Ignore the fact that probably thousands=
 use boxes successfully.</div>
  
<div> </div>
 
<div>"We have conduct=
ed a few listening studies of reported radio-sweep EVP and the results have=
 not been good. We have also worked with a variety of such devices. Based o=
n what we know about trans-etheric influences, how EVP and visual forms of =
ITC are formed and what we know about mediumship, it is difficult to fit ra=
dio-sweep into any established hypothesis. Without solid research supportin=
g it as producing EVP, it is impossible for us to recommend it or support i=
ts use. If there were double-blind studies conducted by experienced researc=
hers that shows it does produce phenomena, we would gladly promote it as an=
 alternative technique.<br>
  <br>
We are pretty sure that, in transfo=
rm EVP (ordinary recorder), the voice is formed in the electronics by trans=
forming available audio-frequency noise in an active part of the electronic=
s such as a transistor junction. We think the process is amplification of a=
 weak telekinetic signal via stochastic resonance and we have found that th=
e optimum audio-frequency signal for this is a chaotic one rich in voice-fr=
equencies with many transient perturbation. That is our working hypothesis.=
 "</div>
  
<div> </div>
 
<div> I can't say who this is from, cu=
z almost certain I'd get sued. There's no double blind testing their BS eit=
her. Clueless!!</div>
 
<div> </div>
 
<div> F-S<br>
<br>
</div>
